introduction: A choreographic fantasy based on the tragedy of the same name by William Shakespeare . It was staged in the tradition of Soviet choreodrama . The choreography is based on a mixture of classical ballet movements and modern (for the USSR at that time) dance.Maris Liepa - HamletMargarita Alfimova - GertrudeSergey Radchenko - ClaudiusIrina Kholina - OpheliaAndrey Kondratov - LaertesVasily Smoltsov - PoloniusEkaterina Aksenova, Irina Vozianova - ThoughtsGrigory Gurevich - GhostNatalia Yegelskaya, Georgy Gots, Evgeny Nizovoy - ActorsArtists of the Bolshoi Theater - courtiers, jesters
